timeline.bodyText: I'd feel more comfortable if EMPTY still mapped to 1, CORRECT mapped to 0 (maybe with a comment stating that it was previously null, implementer's choice)
timeline.author: david-allison-1

+++ b/AnkiDroid/src/main/java/com/ichi2/libanki/Note.java

@@ -266,9 +266,9 @@ public class Note implements Cloneable {
      */
 
     public enum DupeOrEmpty {
+        CORRECT,
         EMPTY,
         DUPE,
-        CORRECT,
     }
     /**
